summary: Colonel Mostyn of the British Intelligence Service suspects there is a leak in his department and hires an American expatriate to eliminate various targets working for the Soviets.
cast: Rod Taylor|Trevor Howard|Jill St. John|Wilfrid Hyde-White|David Tomlinson|Akim Tamiroff|Eric Sykes|Gabriella Licudi|John Le Mesurier|Derek Nimmo|Jeremy Lloyd|Jennifer Jayne|Heller Toren|Betty McDowall|Jo Rowbottom|Colin Gordon|Louise Dunn|Henri Cogan|Daniel Emilfork|Scot Finch|Ronald Leigh-Hunt|Richard Wattis|David Langton|Tony Wright|Suzy Kendall|Andrew Andreas|Jack Armstrong|Alexandra Bastedo|Hyma Beckley|Paul Beradi|Rodney Cardiff|Pauline Chamberlain|Vic Chapman|Bill Cummings|Francis De Wolff|Michael Dempsey|Ernest Fennemore|Hal Galili|Rex Garner|Muriel Greenslade|Aidan Harrington|Aiden Harrington|Victor Harrington|Walter Henry|Laurence Herder|Bill Hibbert|George Hilsdon|George Holdcroft|Barbara Jefford|Gerry Judge|Pat Judge|Juba Kennerley|Aileen Lewis|Al Lewis|Brian Magill|Jack Mandeville|Ray Marioni|Louis Matto|Tony Mendleson|Richard Neller|Patrick O'Connell|George Oliver|Gerald Paris|Ken Parry|Michael Peake|Fred Peck|Rhonda Ryan|Emile Stemmler|Philip Stewart|Phillip Stewart|John Tatham|James Ure|Ken Wayne|Fred Wood
title: El liquidador
